headline: Advanced Energy Industries and Paycom Software have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day
summary: AEIS powers the semiconductor surge with strong growth and precision tech, while PAYC falters amid slowing sales and rising competition.

headline: What Paycom Software (PAYC)'s AI-Driven HR Automation Advances Mean for Shareholders
summary: In October 2025, Paycom Software, Inc. released enhancements to its Direct Data Exchange速 analytics tool, integrating new EY research that highlights rising labor costs associated with manual HR tasks and the financial benefits of increased automation through tools like its AI-powered "I Want" feature and Beti速 payroll solution. EY's latest data shows that automating HR processes can drive substantial cost savings, with Paycom identifying a US$5 million efficiency gain for The Kraft Group...

headline: 2 S&P 500 Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Brush Off
summary: While the S&P 500 (^GSPC) includes industry leaders, not every stock in the index is a winner. Some companies are past their prime, weighed down by poor execution, weak financials, or structural headwinds.
